site_name: Metropolitan Building, Lots Road Power Station, Lots Road, SW10 0QH and Land Adjacent
description:
Joint Decision and Verification Order required for the numbering and naming of the new mixed-use development on site of former Lots Road Power Station, Lots Road, London, SW10 0QH and land adjacent, linked to Planning applications PP/02/01324, PP/13/04082 & PP/16/06360 as follows:

The names 'Metropolitan Building, Lots Road Power Station' to be deleted and the address to be numbered and formerly known as:

39 Lots Road, SW10 0QH - (See Schedule 1 for internal numbering)

Lots Road - Additional New Street Numbers

31, Lots Road SW10
33, Lots Road SW10
35, Lots Road SW10
41, Lots Road SW10
45, Lots Road SW10
47, Lots Road SW10
49, Lots Road SW10
51, Lots Road SW10
53, Lots Road SW10 - (See Schedule 2 for internal numbering)
55, Lots Road SW10

New Street Name

Waverley Square

Waverley Square - New Street Numbers

1, Waverley Square SW10 - (See Schedule 3 for internal numbering)
2, Waverley Square SW10 - (See Schedule 4 for internal numbering)
6, Waverley Square SW10 - (See Schedule 5 for internal numbering)
